name: pandas
description: pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data analysis and manipulation tool,built on top of the Python programming language.

name: polars
description: a lightning fast DataFrame library that: Utilizes all available cores on your machine. Optimizes queries to reduce unneeded work/memory allocations. Handles datasets much larger than your available RAM. Has an API that is consistent and predictable. Has a strict schema (data-types should be known before running the query).
